column3:
山麓の馬宿に飾ってある風景画は
この馬宿を南の方から眺めて描かれたものらしい

馬宿や火山など いろいろ描かれている風景画
よく見てみると……
column4:
The landscape painting hanging on the wall
of the Foothill Stable was painted by the
stable's owner, Ozunda, who paints as a hobby.

You can make out details of the landscape
such as a volcano and stable. Some of this
seems familiar...

column3:
山麓の馬宿に
飾ってある風景画

その風景画に描かれていた
古代の祠を見つけた！
column4:
There is a landscape painting adorning the wall
of the Foothill Stable.

You've discovered the shrine hidden in
the painting!
